name: Killers and Thieves
description: Become the leader of a medieval thieves' guild in Killers and Thieves from the co-creator of the Banner Saga series. Train a team, steal loot and master heists throughout a sprawling city to take your revenge.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP (sp2) or later Processor: 1.66 GHz Dual Core Processor or equivalent Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA since 2006 (GeForce 8), AMD since 2006 (Radeon HD 2000), Intel since 2012 (HD 4000 / IvyBridge) DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 2 GB available space
